refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Memcache::getVersion returns a string with server's version number.
Also you can use memcache_get_version function. See example below.

example.title: Memcache::getVersion example
example.programlisting:
<?php

/* procedural API */
$memcache_obj = memcache_connect('memcache_host', 11211);

echo memcache_get_version($memcache_obj);

/* OO API */
$memcache_obj = new Memcache;
echo $memcache_obj->getVersion();

?>

refsect1.para: Memcache::getVersion returns &false; if an error occured.
